title: Richard Baxter's Catholick theologie plain, pure, peaceable, for pacification of the dogmatical word-warriours who, 1. by contending about things unrevealed or not understood, 2. and by taking verbal differences for real,
author: Baxter, Richard, 1615-1691.
publisher: Printed by Robert White for Nevill Simmons ...,
notes: Parts 1, 2, and 3 of book I and book II each has special t.p.
Contains only books I-II. The third book was never published. Cf. BM.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
(from t.p.) I. Pacifying principles -- II. A pacifying praxis or dialogue -- III. Pacifying disputations.
